data.title: Joan Boniface (Winnifrith) Nathan MBE (1913-2004)
data.meta_description: Is this your ancestor? Explore genealogy for Joan (Winnifrith) Nathan MBE born 1913 Ightham, Kent, England, United Kingdom died 2004 Beverly Hills, Los Angeles, California, United States including father + children + 1 photos + more in the free family tree community.
data.text:
Profile last modified 30 May 2024 | Created 6 Jan 2022

This page has been accessed 631 times.

Contents

1 Biography

1.1 First Marriage

1.2 Second Marriage

1.3 Third Marriage

2 Sources

Biography

Joan (Winnifrith) Nathan MBE was born in Ightham, Kent, England.

Joan (Winnifrith) Nathan MBE is Notable.

Joan (Joanna) Anna Boniface Winnifrith was born on 2 Jan 1913 in Ightham, Kent, England, United Kingdom. [1]

She was the daughter of Bertram Thomas Winnifrith and Edith Maude Blaker.

She traveled to Canada and America in 1930.[2][3]

First Marriage

She married firstly Robert Edward Stevenson Oct-Nov-Dec 1934 in Kensington, London, England United Kingdom.[4]

CHILDREN:

Joanna Venetia Invicta Stevenson Tamblyn.[5][6]

Caroline Stevenson

Immigration to the United States 1939

Robert and his family emigrated to New York in 1939 on the ship Normandie. [7]

By 1940 she was living with her husband Robert Stephenson and daughter Venetia in Los Angeles, California.[8]

Second Marriage

She married secondly George Hoyt Stafford on 22 Jun 1944 in Beverly Hills, Los Angeles, California.[9]

CHILDREN:

John Winnifrith Stafford.[10]

Naturalised United States Citizen

She became a naturalised US citizen under the name Joanna Boniface Stafford (#123624) on 6 April 1945; certificate issued 8 June 1945 (#6183889, Los Angeles, California).

Third Marriage

She married thirdly Robert Guntal Nathan on 5 Apr 1970 in Los Angeles, California.[11]

Her husband Robert died on 26 May 1985 in Hollywood, Los Angeles, California.[12]

She died on 14 May 2004 in Beverly Hills, Los Angeles, California.[13][14][15]

Sources

↑ "England and Wales Birth Registration Index, 1837-2008," database, FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:2F5M-QSR : 1 October 2014), Joan B Winnifrith, 1913 Mar Quarter, mother's maiden name Blaker; from "England & Wales Births, 1837-2006," database, findmypast (http://www.findmypast.com : 2012); citing Birth Registration, Malling, Kent, England, citing General Register Office, Southport, England.

↑ "Vermont, St. Albans Canadian Border Crossings, 1895-1954," database with images, FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:QK3B-ZHWX : 23 February 2021), Joan Boniface Winnifrith, 1930; citing M1464, Soundex Index to Canadian Border Entries through the St. Albans, Vermont, District, 1895-1924, 568, NARA microfilm publications M1461, M1463, M1464, and M1465 (Washington D.C.: National Archives and Records Administration, publication year); FHL microfilm 2,155,338.

↑ "United States Border Crossings from Canada to United States, 1895-1956", database, FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:X2BH-XPG : 13 November 2019), Joan Boniface Winnifrith (Unknown), 1930.
